title: Mern Chat App
description: A real time chat app using MERN Stack and Sockets. User will be able to chat with other user. Deployed using render.com free tier.

title: Expense Tracker
description: Developing a MERN stack app to track earnings/expenses. Intuitive UI, dynamic dashboard with visual graphs (Chart.js), styled using Tailwind CSS & Daisy UI.

title: Portfolio Website
description: A react app to demonstrate my projects, interest and my education. Deployed using github pages.

title: Old Portfolio Website
description: Another react app to create the Portfolio website. Deploy the website using github pages. It contains information about my projects, interest and my education.

title: Cricket Auction
description: Currently working on a react app which simulates a franchise league auction. 10 teams can bid for a player and highest bidder will get the player. The goal is the complete the squad within the budget

title: Hangman
description: In this python project, hangman game is developed with keeping in mind about the rules

title: Blackjack Game
description: A python project where I implemented the concept of BlackJack Card Game. As of now, only one player can play with the computer. I am working on making it a multiplayer game.

title: Higher Lower Game
description: Developed Higher Lower game concept. In this there are two section and player has to compare if the left section is higher or lower. If the user guess it right, then the game keeps on going otherwise any wrong guess will result in end of the game.
